name: Christoph the Change
description: '''Christopher Christoph Nyenga''' (born 10 April 1993), known professionally as '''Christoph the Change''', is a [[Liberia]]n rapper and songwriter. After releasing the hip-hop track "Take a Break", he was criticized for sounding "too American". He gained mainstream success in Liberia after releasing the [[Hipco]] songs "Papay God", "Heaven and Hell", and "Gbanna Man".
